catalysts.thesis: High-growth iGaming operator reporting Q4 earnings today; consistently beats revenue estimates (10 consecutive quarters).
catalysts.catalyst_details: Q4 2025 Earnings Report (After Market Close). Expected EPS $0.10, Rev $304M. Key drivers: Colombia tax removal (boosting 2026 EBITDA), new market entries (Alberta), and FIFA World Cup 2026 tailwinds.
catalysts.absorption_status: Stock has 'cooled' recently (-4% 1yr return despite +40% in 2025), suggesting profit-taking has cleared weak hands before the print.
catalysts.prediction_market: High probability of revenue beat based on historical performance.
catalysts.risk: Regulatory changes in Latin America; Insider selling by CEO in early Feb (likely tax/diversification but noted).
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Valuation discounts the $25-30M EBITDA benefit from recent Colombia tax reform.
